Articles.Content:
Hey bobcat any news on when we might see some more of the H.O.M.E 2 work your doing?

I'd ask that in the Bobcat development thread, instead of this "Historical Spacecraft" thread.

BOBCAT LOOK

http://dreamsofspace.blogspot.de/2013/02/bear-in-space-1970.html

BEAR

IN

SPAAAAACE
A mod for the Ares I? If only there would be a pre-order button...

A mod for the Ares I? If only there would be a pre-order button...

Orion and Ares I its first step in American pack

Wow Bobcat, that's looking very good. You appear to be one of those devs that gets going and doesn't stop!

I'm looking forward to this a lot, I loved the Soyuz stuff.

First off. LOVE this pack

Question. Could we get a Kliper PDF and possible preasembled Kliper in the next update?

---Question. Could we get a Kliper PDF and possible preasembled Kliper in the next update?

PDF - No , the man who was engaged in lost interest KSP

Preassembled - Yes.
BobCat, you're awesome! I cannot wait for the Orion pod to be released. I was very sad when I saw the pictures of the outdated incompatible Ceres version from KW.
I was doing the buran pdf for you, lost track of it? Me finish for you?

For those of you who don't obsessively look for BobCat designs like... um... me... he put out the ISS pack in rough alpha form.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-19-x-iss-space-station-pack-ver-0-03/

Will it be awesome, even in a rough and incomplete state? OF COURSE IT WILL!!!! It's BobCat and Yogui and Devo and WCOLE and everyone!

Edited May 17, 2013 by daver4470

For those of you who don't obsessively look for BobCat designs like... um... me... he put out the ISS pack in rough alpha form.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-19-x-iss-space-station-pack-ver-0-03/

Will it be awesome, even in a rough and incomplete state? OF COURSE IT WILL!!!! It's BobCat and Yogui and Devo and WCOLE and everyone!

Excellent. ****ing finally too. His MIR is amazing so I have high hopes for this. Immediate download.

Now with the I.S.S. I feel like my 'collection' of functional historical parts is close to completion. I don't have a Shuttle but the Buran does just fine anyway. I've got all the probes, rovers, Soyuz, MIR, Proton, Falcon 9/Dragon...now if I could just please please please get someone to make some faithful and functional Atlas V and Delta II launch systems I'd be absolutely set for life!

Also, I wanted to ask you BobCat, if you'd ever do the N1 and finish/remake the LOK/LK and Block D? I know you've got a lot of stuff you're doing, but I just really enjoy your work. Made me jump back into KSP since I last left at 0.15 when I had the RocketCo. Kerbabl/Noyuz.

Edited May 17, 2013 by Good_Apollo

Also, I wanted to ask you BobCat, if you'd ever do the N1 and finish/remake the LOK/LK and Block D? I know you've got a lot of stuff you're doing, but I just really enjoy your work. Made me jump back into KSP since I last left at 0.15 when I had the RocketCo. Kerbabl/Noyuz.

I'm guessing he's taking a break from Soviet stuff for nowÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ e.g. he said he wouldn't work on a Vostok until after KSP v0.2.

Maybe they will even remove the height limit, thenÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ allowing for space for the N1.

Maybe they will even remove the height limit, thenÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ allowing for space for the N1.

Well, some people may want to actually play instead of work on the game. Just a thought. I know we think of these guys as a huge part of the KSP community, but they are gamers like us. We need to give them breathing room.

BobCat, if there is one thing I would like you to do, it is to fix the Buran Arm thing. It's driving me NUTS!!!!! I tried 6 times to dock Unity with Zarya, but every time it wobbles and explodes. I did put heavy struts on the arm and cabin, but it still blows up. PLEASE...

If it wouldn't be for that, the ISS and Soviet Packs combined give you the best mod ever!

It's a game engine problem, BobCat can't do much

have you tried pressing caps lock for fine controls?

Romfaref know how fix that... but...

If we fix one problem , we start 2 new problem. ((

Old version plugin no have this problem, but grabbed object no have any phisics.

have you tried pressing caps lock for fine controls?
This helps LOADS. You still have to be very careful...but it works like 60% of the time...

Romfarer says use the lazorSystem RSAS, it's the red one, attitude control or something like that.

WCOLE
